name: Live in Space
description:
Astronauts!

Your spaceship was destroyed. You found yourself in open space.

The only hope are safe-pods filled with oxygen.

You must carefully spend the rest of your oxygen to fuel your jetpack and get to safe-pods to refill oxygen.

And don't get lost in open space.

And ONE more thing.

THERE'S NO HOPE, ASTRONAUTS.

You are ALONE. You will DIE.

But we'll remember you as brave men, if you try to SURVIVE.

AS LONG AS YOU CAN.

- You can play alone or with a friend. If you play with a friend - if one of you dies or floats beyond the screen border - you will both lose.

- Controls:

Player 1: "Arrow Left", "Arrow Right" to rotate. "Arrow Up" to use JetPack.

Player 2: "A" and "D" to rotate. "W" to use Jetpack.

Good luck and share your longest surviving time!

Plans:

- Rating Tab

- Space Monsters

- Levels

- Survival Rivals mode

- Astronauts Skins

- Weapons

and More...

Source code: https://github.com/kiripu/libgdxjam2015entry
